attributes.action: Remove car allowance and car related expenses for all LTN supporting politicians
attributes.additional_details:
We call on the government to immediately stop approving and paying all car/car related expenses for LTN supporting politicians.

We call on the government to ensure that if Boris Johnson or Grant Schapps need to travel in a motorised vehicle, they are only permitted to do so via public transport and not in a personal or private vehicle.

There is adequate CCTV on those modes. If good safe enough for protection of the public, it is good enough for those who travel with an entourage of bodyguards.
attributes.background: Politicians who believe so strongly in LTNs should be upholding their values rather than projecting them in the public. These politicians need to use LTNs in actuality rather than declaring their benefits in theory.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
